alterego_mod:Birthday.NAME: Birthday
alterego_mod:Birthday.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. Draw a card. Exhaust.

alterego_mod:Venus.NAME: Venus
alterego_mod:Venus.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.
alterego_mod:Venus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Upgrade ALL cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

alterego_mod:Swimsuit.NAME: Swimsuit
alterego_mod:Swimsuit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! Vulnerable and !M! Frail.
